nlu_data_set¶

class nlutestframework.nlu_data_set.NLUDataSet(title, data_path, validation_percentage, language=None, ignore_cache=False)[source]¶

Bases: nlutestframework.has_logger.HasLogger

__init__(title, data_path, validation_percentage, language=None, ignore_cache=False)[source]¶
Parameters

  • title (str) – The title of this data set.

  • data_path (str) – The path to the file or directory containing the data in an implementation-specific format. User directory references and environment variables are expanded.

  • validation_percentage (int) – The percentage of the data to be used for performance validation, the remaining data is used for training. Expects a positive whole number between 0 and 100.

  • language (Optional[str]) – The language tag of this data set, e.g. “en” or “en-us”. If this parameter is set to None or omitted, the implementation is assumed to get that information from somewhere else.

  • ignore_cache (bool) – A boolean flag indicating whether the data cache should be ignored.

Raises

  • OSError – in case the data could not be loaded or cached due to I/O or other OS-related issues.

  • ValueError – if the validation data set or the training data set are empty after splitting the data based on validation_percentage.

  • ValueError – if the data path does not point to an existing file or directory.

Sentences assigned to the None-intent are treated differently. These sentences are first removed from the data set, the remaining data is then shuffled and split and the None-data is added to the validation data in the final step.

property title¶
Return type

str

property language¶
Return type

str

reshuffle()[source]¶

Shuffle the data and split it into training and validation data. This method does not make sure that the new splitting is different from previous splittings, but given a decent amount of data the chance for that should be low enough.

Raises

ValueError – if the validation data set or the training data set are empty after splitting the data.

Return type

None

property training_data¶

Returns: The data to train on.

Return type

List[NLUDataEntry]

property validation_data¶

Returns: The data to validate with.

Return type

List[NLUDataEntry]
